author: grapier@businessinsider.com (Graham Rapier), Graham Rapier
title: Uber is listing jobs for out-of-work drivers at companies like Domino's, Amazon, and McDonalds (UBER)
description: REUTERS/Carlo Allegri Uber has expanded its Works business to list jobs for out-of-work drivers at other companies within its app for drivers. Listings so far include Shipt, McDonald's, Amazon, and more. Uber's core taxi business has been decimated as the cor…
content:
Uber is now listing jobs at other companies for its drivers and couriers, including openings at Amazon, Domino's, McDonald's and more as the coronavirus pandemic causes the company's core taxi businesses to plummet.
The new offerings, located in Uber's app f… [+1700 chars]
